alert.note: Alert for Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 7:27PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kent, northeastern Talbot, south central Queen Anne`s and Caroline Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 727 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harmony, or 11 miles north of Hurlock, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Denton, Greensboro, Oakland, Ridgely, Queen Anne, Harmony, Smithville, Jumptown, Agner, Matthews, Griffin, Cordova and Hillsboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
